scenario.name: The wholesale purchases of green and red bicycles

event.name: Establish the use of Dai as a resource type
Establish all the economic agent types
Establish all economic agents

instance.name: Establish the Bill's Bikes Manufacturing as a seller
Establish Jonas's Bike Shop as buyer
Establish Danish Tax Agency as tax authority

event.name: Establish the sport bikes as resource types

stimulus.name: Define green and red sport bike types

event.name: Establish inventory of all instances of green bikes

stimulus.name: Establish the inventory of green sport bikes

event.name: Establish inventory of all instances of red bikes

stimulus.name: Establish the inventory of red sport bikes

event.name: Establish the delivery and payment types of event

stimulus.name: Define delivery and payment event types

event.name: Buyer: What inventory do you have?
Seller: I have red and green bikes
Buyer: Do you have the green bikes that I want?
Seller: Yes, I have the bikes that you want
Buyer: Okay, here is an order for green bikes
Seller: Deal! The order is acceptable

stimulus.target: PC001 PC002 PC003 PC004 PC005 PC006 PC007 PC008 PC009 PC010
stimulus.name: Add actual price

event.name: Buyer: Okay, here is the payment
Seller: Thank you, I have despatched 10 green bikes
Buyer: Thank you, I have received 10 green bikes

stimulus.target: PC001 PC002 PC003 PC004 PC005 PC006 PC007 PC008 PC009 PC010
stimulus.name: Accept an order

event.name: Seller: We're square, here is your invoice
Buyer: Do you have the red bikes that I want?
Seller: Well, I have some of the bikes that you want but not all
Buyer: Okay, here is an order (contract) for red bikes
Seller: Deal! The order is acceptable
Buyer: Okay, here is the payment
